headline: Ford Sets an EV Sales Record. The Stock Falls Anyway.
summary: Ford Motor  ‘s November sales results for the U.S. look pretty good, but the stock slipped anyway on Wednesday.  Ford delivered about 166,000 vehicles in November, up about 14% year over year.  As for all-electric cars, Ford sold almost 6,000 Mustang Mach-Es, about 3,600 F-150 Lightnings, and more than 1,200 e-Transit vans in November.

headline: Ford to invest in Indonesian EV plant
